scripts.build:exp: tsc -p tsconfig.experiments.json && mkdir -p dist/experiments && cp experiments/schema.json dist/experiments/schema.json
scripts.build:static: mkdir -p dist/icons && cp -r icons/* dist/icons/ && cp src/manifest.json dist/manifest.json && test -f src/options.html && cp src/options.html dist/options.html || true && test -f src/options.css && cp src/options.css dist/options.css || true
scripts.build: pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run clean && pnpm run build:bg && pnpm run build:exp && pnpm run build:options && pnpm run build:static
scripts.dev: pnpm run build && dotenv -e .env.tb -- node scripts/run-webext.mjs
